title: About
text:
This is a Quarto slidedeck.

Create new labs GitHub-Repo
Create new branch gh-pages
Change settings in page: gh-pages and root
Open VS Code
Change Quarto seetings in files
Render all in terminal: quarto render
Push to GitHub

title: Title
text:
Code
1penguins |>
2  mutate(
    bill_ratio = bill_depth_mm / bill_length_mm,
    bill_area  = bill_depth_mm * bill_length_mm
  )

title: Workflow
text:
This is a Quarto slidedeck.

Create new labs GitHub-Repo
Create new branch gh-pages
Change settings in page: gh-pages and root
Open VS Code
Change Quarto seetings in files
Render all in terminal: quarto render
Push to GitHub
